item.title: Using jQuery validation plugin with fields in a jQuery UI .dialog()
item.description: One issue I ran into while using the jQuery UI library along with the jQuery validation plugin in an ASP.NET page is that when the dialog is created, it’s moved outside of the page’s main form. jQuery validation requires all fields to be validated to be inside a form, so fields in the dialog won’t validate, plus if you need to have server-side controls inside of that dialog, there’s not a lot you can do to move the dialog or the form.
